span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】adj. 贪婪的，渴求财富的：marked by inordinate desire for wealth or possessions or for another's possessions
【例】cast covetous eyes on their neighbors' fields 对他邻居的土地垂涎
【近】acquisitive, avaricious, avid, rapacious, grasping
【反】easily-satiated 容易满足的；unenvious 不艳羡的
【派】covet v. 觊觎，贪婪
【记】 covet 垂涎。
